 rec          recFlgRun               1      /           bool     /               /               /           enable flag                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
 rec          recEnmModLoad           1      /           int      0               2               /           load mode (<value> 0: load from pipe; 1. load from file; 2. load random data)
